question: Based on the stakeholder model in the <image 1>, which of the following options is not considered by critics of stakeholder theory to be a benefit to stakeholders?
description: The image is a cartoon illustration titled "Figure 1.8 Mapping of stakeholders." It depicts a group of people holding puzzle pieces around an organization labeled "ORGANIZATION." The people are diverse in appearance, with some wearing suits and others in casual attire. They are positioned in a circular arrangement around the organization, each holding a different puzzle piece. The overall scene suggests that the stakeholders are integral parts of the organization, contributing to its structure and function. The illustration emphasizes the interconnectedness and importance of various stakeholders in relation to the organization.
